summary: Completed comprehensive testing of email popup and coupon features. Email popup appears after 5 seconds on homepage, generates valid coupon codes, and coupon validation works correctly in booking form step 4.

minor_bugs.issue: Occasional timeout during booking creation (10s timeout)
Occasional timeout during email subscription (10s timeout)

passed_tests: Email popup appears after 5 seconds on homepage
Email popup does NOT appear on /rezervace page
Email subscription creates valid coupon code
Coupon validation endpoint works for valid codes
Coupon validation endpoint returns 404 for invalid codes
Duplicate email subscription returns existing coupon
Coupon field present in booking form step 4
Invalid coupon shows error message in booking form
Valid coupon shows success message in booking form
Price summary updates with discount when coupon applied
success_percentage: Backend: 83% (10/12 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all email popup and coupon features working)
